description.value:
Due to her conditioning, an orc can choose one skill that becomes a class skill for her. If the chosen skill is a class skill from the class she takes at 1st level, she instead gains a +1 bonus to checks with that skill. In addition, due to her confidence with that skill, once per day, before she attempts a check with the chosen skill, the orc can grant herself a +2 bonus to that check.

This is the usage tracking feature item for @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.XnOoEtDXivY3pVpj]{Conditioned Focus}. Edit the modifiers with the chosen skill in the Modifier tabs of both feature items.

modifiers.name: Conditioned Focus (+2 Focus)
modifiers.notes: Once per day, before she attempts a check with the chosen skill, the orc can grant herself a +2 bonus to that check.
